trans-unit.source: Defines the methods that a class must implement in order to support the creation of style rules.
trans-unit.target: 定義類別必須實作才能支援的樣式規則建立的方法。

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement this interface can use it to support the creation of style rules.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個介面的類別可以用它來支援建立樣式規則。

trans-unit.source: To customize the way cascading style sheets are created and registered, you must create a class that implements this interface.
trans-unit.target: 若要自訂的階層式樣式表的建立和註冊的方式，您必須建立實作這個介面的類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHead> class implements this interface for use by ASP.NET through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Header%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHead>類別會實作這個介面，以供透過 ASP.NET<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Header%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Header%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHead>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Adding or modifying styles or style rules programmatically during asynchronous postbacks is not supported.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 不支援新增或在非同步回傳期間以程式設計方式修改樣式或樣式規則。

trans-unit.source: When you add AJAX capabilities to an ASP.NET Web page, asynchronous postbacks update regions of the page without updating the whole page.
trans-unit.target: 當您新增 AJAX 功能 ASP.NET 網頁時，非同步回傳會更新網頁的區域，而不更新整個頁面。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Microsoft Ajax Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Microsoft Ajax 概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: When implemented by a class, creates a style rule for the specified document language element type, or selector.
trans-unit.target: 由類別實作時，會建立指定的文件語言項目類型或選取器的樣式規則。

trans-unit.source: The CreateStyleRule method creates a style rule for the specified selector.
trans-unit.target: CreateStyleRule 方法會建立指定的選取器的樣式規則。

trans-unit.source: Multiple style rules can be created for the same selector.
trans-unit.target: 相同的選取器，可以建立多個樣式規則。

trans-unit.source: If `urlResolver` is set to `null`, the URL of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> instance is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`urlResolver`設`null`，目前的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>會使用執行個體。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Adding or modifying styles or style rules programmatically during asynchronous postbacks is not supported.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 不支援新增或在非同步回傳期間以程式設計方式修改樣式或樣式規則。

trans-unit.source: When you add AJAX capabilities to an ASP.NET Web page, asynchronous postbacks update regions of the page without updating the whole page.
trans-unit.target: 當您新增 AJAX 功能 ASP.NET 網頁時，非同步回傳會更新網頁的區域，而不更新整個頁面。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Microsoft Ajax Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Microsoft Ajax 概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The style rule to be added to the embedded style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至內嵌的樣式表的樣式規則。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService"></xref>-implemented object that contains the context information for the current location (URL).
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService"> </xref>-實作物件，其中包含目前的位置 (URL) 的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: The part of the HTML page affected by the style.
trans-unit.target: 受到樣式的 HTML 網頁的一部分。

trans-unit.source: When implemented by a class, adds a new style rule to the embedded style sheet in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<head>" name="<head>" href=""></xref> section of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 由類別實作時，將新的樣式規則加入至內嵌的樣式表中<xref uid="langword_csharp_<head>" name="<head>" href=""> </xref> Web 頁面的區段。

trans-unit.source: This method adds a new style rule and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.RegisteredCssClass%2A> property name to the embedded style sheet within the `<head>` section of a <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object, and associates the rule with an auto-generated style name.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會將新的樣式規則和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.RegisteredCssClass%2A>內嵌的樣式表內的屬性名稱`<head>`區段<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>物件，並將此規則以自動產生樣式的名稱產生關聯。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.RegisteredCssClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object is rendered using the specified `urlResolver` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>物件使用指定呈現`urlResolver`參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: If `urlResolver` is set to `null`, the URL of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`urlResolver`設`null`，目前的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>用。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object is already registered, it is not added multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>已註冊物件，它不會加入多次。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Adding or modifying styles programmatically during asynchronous postbacks is not supported.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 不支援新增或以程式設計方式在非同步回傳期間修改的樣式。

trans-unit.source: When you add AJAX capabilities to an ASP.NET Web page, asynchronous postbacks update regions of the page without updating the whole page.
trans-unit.target: 當您新增 AJAX 功能 ASP.NET 網頁時，非同步回傳會更新網頁的區域，而不更新整個頁面。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Microsoft Ajax Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Microsoft Ajax 概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The style rule to be added to the embedded style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至內嵌的樣式表的樣式規則。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService"></xref>-implemented object that contains the context information for the current location (URL).
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService"> </xref>-實作物件，其中包含目前的位置 (URL) 的內容資訊。
